page.title: 09Trerice_Questionaire Results
page.content: On Wednesday, the 17th and Thursday 18th of July 1985 class 3J went to Trerice Manor. During these two days four children questioned an average of twenty-one people a day. On Wednesday twenty-five people were interviewed, on Thursday seventeen people were interviewed. They found out that all the people enjoyed their visit. There was only one person who came from Newquay and there were only three people who came from within the county of Cornwall. Three-quarters of the people were National Trust members. All the people said that the house was *LOVELY*, and that the food in the restaurant-particularly the *CREAM-TEAS* were delicious.
